iKross Waterproof Universal Bike Mount includes a waterproof enclosure and a rotating mount designed to safely and securely hold your smartphones and electronic devices on bicycle or motorcycle bars. The waterproof enclosure keeps your devices sealed from water, dust, dirt and sand, and provides full touchscreen functionality with its large transparent window. The fully adjustable ball head joint with 360 degree rotation and locking system allows you to adjust the devices for customized portrait and landscape view.
